code: import React from"react";import CourseListRow from"./CourseListRow";import'./CourseList.css';import CourseShape from"./CourseShape";import PropType from'prop-types';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseList=_ref=>{let{listCourses}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{id:"CourseList",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("thead",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:"Available courses",isHeader:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:"Course name",textSecondCell:"Credit",isHeader:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:listCourses.length>0?listCourses.map(_ref2=>{let{id,name,credit}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseListRow,{textFirstCell:name,textSecondCell:credit},id);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CourseList,{textFirstCell:"No course available yet"})})]});};CourseList.prototype={listCourses:PropType.arrayOf(CourseShape)};CourseList.defaultProps={listCourses:[]};export default CourseList;
